import "../Admin/Style/AdminTeacher.css"; import "../Admin/Style/AdminTable.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import adminteacherData from "./Modules/AdminTeacherData"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function AdminTeacher() { const [TeacherData, setTeacherData] = useState([]); useEffect = () => { axios .get("https://schoolproject.osapplications.com/api/all-teacher-show") .then((response) => { setTeacherData(response.data); }) .catch() } return ( <>

Teacher Data

{adminteacherData.map((AdminTeacher, index) => ( ))}
Index Image Name Nip Subject Actions
{index + 1} {AdminTeacher.name} {AdminTeacher.nip} {AdminTeacher.subject}
); } export default AdminTeacher;
